name: Dreamcatcher (itch) (thecommonthug)
description:
For Ludum Dare 48:

My first Compo... there's a lot of the idea still on the table, a lot of execution gone wanting, and the code is hillariously frantic. So yea, I loved it, hope you like what I was able to pull together.

WASD movement, arrow keys change orientation (this is intentionally disorienting, being lost is kinda the vibe).

post jam patch notes: updated to fix softlock due to collision mask with cans, included key down movement 4/25/21, fixed mining empty spaces bug and layout 4/26/21
